scripts.package_checklist: npm run build_checklist && npm run npm_pack_checklist && npm run move_checklist
scripts.package_collection: npm run build_collection && npm run npm_pack_collection && npm run move_collection
scripts.package_occurrence: npm run build_occurrence && npm run npm_pack_occurrence && npm run move_occurrence
scripts.package_occurrence-search: npm run build_occurrence-search && npm run npm_pack_occurrence-search && npm run move_occurrence-search
scripts.package_taxa: npm run build_taxa && npm run npm_pack_taxa && npm run move_taxa
scripts.package_symbiota-spatial: npm run build_symbiota-spatial && npm run npm_pack_symbiota-spatial && npm run install_symbiota-spatial
scripts.package_symbiota-auth: npm run build_symbiota-auth && npm run npm_pack_symbiota-auth && npm run install_symbiota-auth
scripts.package_symbiota-shared: npm run build_symbiota-shared && npm run npm_pack_symbiota-shared && npm run install_symbiota-shared
scripts.package_symbiota-plugin: npm run build_symbiota-plugin && npm run npm_pack_symbiota-plugin && npm run install_symbiota-plugin
scripts.package_symbiota-plugin-loader: npm run build_symbiota-plugin-loader && npm run npm_pack_symbiota-plugin-loader && npm run install_symbiota-plugin-loader
scripts.package_all_plugins: npm run package_checklist && npm run package_collection && npm run package_occurrence && npm run package_occurrence-search && npm run package_taxa && npm run package_symbiota-spatial && npm run package_symbiota-auth && npm run package_symbiota-shared && npm run package_symbiota-plugin && npm run package_symbiota-plugin-loader
scripts.package_optional_plugins: npm run package_checklist && npm run package_collection && npm run package_occurrence && npm run package_occurrence-search && npm run package_taxa
scripts.package_core_plugins: npm run package_symbiota-spatial && npm run package_symbiota-auth && npm run package_symbiota-shared && npm run package_symbiota-plugin && npm run package_symbiota-plugin-loader
